div1.p: Note of hand. Samuel Perry to Stephen F. Austin & Co.

body.div1:
N° 74 due 30 Apl Potosi Feb 26th 1817
Sixty days after date I promise to pay to Stephen F. Austin and Co or order Five hundred Dollars without defalcation payable and negotiable at the Bank of St Louis for value Received charged to S. F. Austin
Saml. Perry [Rubric]
